form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: MEDICAL Examination of Applicants for United States Visas

full_text: PLACE MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS BOMBAY FC UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION 4.7.88/86098049 CITY COUNTRY At the request of the American Consul at BOMBAY INDIA NAME AGE SEX IRANI FRENY HORMUSTI 84 F I certify that on the above date I examined WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON T 323523 BOMBAY 16.12.82 I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: CLASS A: DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: Chancroid Lymphogranuloma venereum Gonorrhea Syphilis, infectious stage Granuloma inguinale Tuberculosis, active Leprosy, infectious MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Insanity Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Sexual deviation (See proviso, sec. 34.7, USPHS Regs.) CLASS B: Physical Defect, Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being. CLASS C: Minor Conditions. (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2)) My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed: (1) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect, disease, or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity, as follows (give class-A, B, or C-diagnosis, and pertinent details*): Bilateral cataracts operated. Multiple ostemarthritis. NO PULMONARY OR PLEURAL LESION SEEN. Chest X-ray report Dr. M. Tayabali from Dr. KAHN TEST: NEGATIVE. HTLV (III) ANTIBODIES DR. (MRS.) F. E PALIA Blood serological report from Dr. NOT DETECTED. Other special report(s) (when needed) M.MEHERHOMJI from Dr. SIGNATURE OR MEDICAL TECHNICAL ADVISOR TITLE DATE OF FINAL REPORT MEDICAL EXAMINER 6.7.88 50157-102 *Continue on reverse side if necessary. OPTIONAL FORM 157 (Rev. 5-78) GPO : 1985 o - 479-003 Dept. of State
